channel.title: Katagon #742
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2el1Zyl.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][B]Website: [/B]http://www.katagon.com[/SIZE]
We are a new upcoming private server that is headed straight to the top. We strive to put out quality content that users can actually enjoy on a consistent basis. We are based on revision 742, which is right before EOC was released. We believe that this is a great version of RS as it has the latest features without the new combat system.
[SPOILER=Features] Economic Great PvP and PvM combat Dueling w/ staking God Wars Dungeon Barrows Clan Wars Fight Caves Warriors guild Fully working Grand Exchange Tormented Demons KBD QBD Corporal Beast Voting rewards Flawless switching Summoning Fight Kiln Zombie Minigame Titles Slayer Curses & Normal prayers. (Quick Prayers aswell) All spellbooks (Modern, Ancients, Lunar) Dicing Vine Whip Colored items Money pouch Living Rock Cavern & Rocktail fishing Much more![/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qFL6YV5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UqxtEKz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EV8RJhF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bnOEAnc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fBYmbqe.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER]
